program_information.program_name: Strengthen PSNP4 Institutions and Resilience Development Food Security Activity (SPIR)

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: the combination of T2 and cash transfers led to decreases in women's (but not men's) depressive symptoms

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: targeting women for the poultry and cash transfers (L*)

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We investigate the impacts of the SPIR intervention on men's and women's mental health, marital dynamics, women's agency, and gender equitable attitudes and roles
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: randomly assigning kebeles to one of the following four intervention arms

evidence_citations.country_citation: Many of these effects were worse in Oromia than Amhara
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: among the subsample of extremely poor households
